h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Black Bear Guai
content: This fight will last awhile, so be sure to be mindful of your stamina and back off when you need to recover, or reposition yourself if you find yourself too close to any fire pits he’s created. It’s much better to wait and find a better avenue of attack than getting too reckless and being burned as a result.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Wind_Cave_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Black Wind Cave Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Black Bear Guai'.
The content is as follows:
This fight will last awhile, so be sure to be mindful of your stamina and back off when you need to recover, or reposition yourself if you find yourself too close to any fire pits he’s created. It’s much better to wait and find a better avenue of attack than getting too reckless and being burned as a result.
